reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen makes complex algorithms easy to understand. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson knows her material well, but her tests can be quite difficult. More practice exercises would be helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Martinez's passion for history is contagious. His anecdotes make the subject come alive.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is an exceptional educator. Her lab demonstrations are always fascinating and safety is her top priority.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Taylor's reading list is extensive, but his lectures can be dry. More class discussions would improve the course.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez explains complex concepts clearly. Her problem sets are challenging but help reinforce the material.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. White is knowledgeable, but sometimes moves too quickly through difficult topics. More examples would be beneficial.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel's classes are thought-provoking and encourage critical thinking. Her assignments are relevant and interesting.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown brings real-world examples into his lectures, making economic theories more relatable and easier to grasp.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson's enthusiasm for art is infectious. Her virtual museum tours are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Liu presents balanced viewpoints on controversial topics, but his assignments can be vague at times.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Greene's field trips make learning about ecosystems hands-on and memorable. Her grading is fair and transparent.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Nguyen's Socratic teaching style really encourages deep thinking. His classes are always lively and engaging.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Sanchez's approach to language acquisition theories is comprehensive. Her accent in multiple languages is impressive.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Wright's real-world experience is valuable, but his lectures lack organization. More structure would improve the course.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's explanations of neural pathways are clear and concise. Her lab work is cutting-edge and exciting.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Cohen's composition assignments are challenging but rewarding. His feedback is always constructive and helpful.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Foster's lectures on cultural practices are interesting, but the course workload can be overwhelming at times.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Lee's practical approach to engineering problems is excellent. His projects prepare students well for industry work.
